name: Flanking
description:
Surrounding an enemy, you and your allies press your advantage.

When you and one or more allies are engaged with the same foe, each of you gains +1d to attack rolls against that foe.

Describe how you and your allies work in concert to overwhelm your opponent.

improvements.name: Team Strike
improvements.description: You and the flanking allies also take +1d to damage rolls against the flanked foe.

improvements.name: Topple
improvements.description: When you or a flanking ally lands a hit with a melee attack, one of you other then the attacker may roll Strength vs Dexterity against that foe. If you win the roll, the foe is knocked prone.
